port.description: Port is the port number to listen on.

homeUrl.description: HomeURL is the URL for the UI home page.

serviceUrl.description: ServiceURL is the URL for the service and resources endpoints in the UI.

settingsUrl.description: SettingsURL is the URL for the settings endpoint in the UI.

contextUrl.description: ContextURL is the URL for the context endpoint in the UI.

contextAreaPrefix.description: ContextAreaPrefix sets sub-contexts for replacements in path, header or any other supported place.

disableUI.description: DisableUI is a flag whether to disable the UI.

disableSwaggerUI.description: DisableSpec is a flag whether to disable the Swagger UI.

createFileStructure.description: CreateFileStructure is a flag whether to create the initial resources file structure: contexts, services, etc. Default: true.

fontSize.description: Font size configuration for the editor.

services.description: Services is a map of service name and the corresponding config.

timeout.description: Timeout duration for upstream failure condition.

range.description: HTTP status range for failure conditions.

latency.description: Single latency to add to the response.

latencies.description: Map of percentiles latencies. Not used in the services API, only when endpoint queried directly.

errors.description: Error config with percentiles as keys and HTTP status codes as values.

contexts.description: List of contexts to use for replacements.

maxRecursionLevels.description: Maximum level to parse recursively. 0 means no recursion.

onlyRequired.description: Flag whether to include only required fields.

request.description: Flag whether to validate the request. Default: true.

response.description: Flag whether to validate the response. Default: false.

requestTransformer.description: Callback function name for request transformation.

responseTransformer.description: Callback function name for response transformation.

schema.description: Flag to avoid multiple schema parsing by caching the parsed schema. Default: true.
